info.title: Secure Assessment Platform API
info.description: API for managing secure online assessments with proctoring features

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns tokens
Obtains a new access token using a refresh token
Reset password using token from email

get.description: Returns paginated list of users with optional filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for user name or email

get.description: Returns a specific user by ID
Returns a user's activity logs
Returns assessments taken by a user
Returns paginated list of assessments with optional filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for assessment title or description

get.description: Returns a specific assessment by ID

post.description: Creates a copy of an assessment

get.description: Returns all questions for an assessment

post.description: Adds a new question to an assessment

put.description: Updates the settings for an assessment

get.description: Returns results for an assessment
Returns most recently created assessments

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of assessments to return

get.description: Returns statistics about assessments
Returns assessments available to the current student
Returns a student's results for a specific assessment
Returns the details of an assessment attempt

post.description: Saves an answer for a question in an attempt
Reports a monitoring event during an assessment

get.description: Returns aggregated analytics on user activity
Returns analytics on assessment performance

post.description: Reports a session-related event for an assessment
Reports suspicious activity during an assessment

get.description: Returns summary statistics for the admin dashboard
Returns recent activity for the admin dashboard
Returns the current system status

post.summary: Grade attempt by add feedback and final score.

get.summary: Get assessment attempt of user on for admin
get.description: Returns the list of an assessment attempt of user for admin

get.summary: Get attempt details of users for admin
get.description: Returns the details of an assessment attempt for admin

get.summary: Get attempt of user for admin
get.description: Returns the list of attempt attempt for admin
list all suspicious action from user
get all assessment attempted by user

description.example: This midterm assessment covers algebra, geometry, and basic calculus.
Comprehensive final exam covering all topics discussed in class.
Comprehensive final exam covering all topics discussed in class including organic chemistry.

text.example: What is the solution to x + 5x + 6 = 0?
Which of the following is a noble gas?
Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.
Describe the process of cellular respiration.
What is the solution to x + 5x + 6 = 0?

feedback.example: Great work! Your essay will be graded manually.
Good job on the electricity section. Work on improving your understanding of mechanics.

message.example: Please ensure your face is visible in the webcam at all times.
Must be a valid email address
You do not have permission to access this resource
